long_description: The REI Sariska knickers are at home on a yoga mat, atop an elliptical trainer or along a local trail thanks to their moisture-wicking fabric that keeps you comfortable during exercise. Polyester and spandex blend offers moisture-wicking comfort that keeps skin dry, and it feels soft against skin thanks to its brushed fabric face. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Gusseted crotch increases range of motion, rib-knit trim increases comfort and flexibility. Flat seams are designed for movement and reduce chafing. The REI Sariska knickers offer an active fit that moves effortlessly with the body and won't bind or twist; mid rise hits a couple in. below the belly button.
